sourcesContent:
import React, { memo } from 'react' import styles from './index.module.css' import formatDistanceToNowStrict from 'date-fns/formatDistanceToNowStrict' import Photo from '../photo' import * as ICON from '../icons' import IconButton from '../icon-button' import {useEffect,useState} from 'react' function StructureTweet({name,mention,date,children,big}) { const [tampon,setTampon]=useState(true) const untilNow = formatDistanceToNowStrict(date) var [newText,setNewText]=useState('') useEffect(()=> { setTimeout(setTampon(false),1500) setNewText(JSON.parse(localStorage['TEXT'])) localStorage.setItem('TEXT',JSON.parse('UYGULAMAMA HOŞGELDİNİZ')) console.log(tampon); },[]) return (!tampon && newText.map((tweet)=> { return (
{/* BAŞLA */}
{name} @{mention} • {untilNow}

{tweet}

5
12
{/* BİTİR */}
) }) ) } export default StructureTweet
